caption.title: Predictive-skill curves based on Pearson correlation coefficients for convergent cross-mapping of aeolian desertification land area with the possible influencing factors.
caption.p: Dotted lines on either side of the predictive-skill curves represent the Â±standard deviation of estimate assessed from bootstrapping based on 1000 iterations. Convergent cross-mapping is based on procedures written in the R-programming language initially developed by Clark et al. 25. Pearson correlation coefficient represents the correlation between two variables. Library length is the number of historical observations, including observation time and number of spatial replicates included in the composite time series 24 25.
